title: His Majesties declaration to the ministers, freeholders, farmers, and substantiall copy-holders of the county of Yorke Assembled by His Majesties speciall summons, at Heworth Moore, neere the city of Yorke; on Friday, the 3. of June, 1642.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: York: Printed by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill: and reprinted at London, for John Sweeting, at the Angell in Popes Head Alley,
